text: Shapoklyak () is a 1974 Soviet animated movie directed by Roman Kachanov.ШапоклякШапокляк (1974) ==Actors== *Vasily Livanov as Gena the Crocodile *Irina Mazing as Shapoklyak *Klara Rumyanova as Cheburashka *Vladimir Ferapontov as Gena (singing voice) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1974 movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies Category:Movies about crocodiles Category:Movies directed by Roman Kachanov
title: Shapoklyak (movie)
